title: Bigger punishment for toxic players
body: i think toxic players who are constantly reported deserve a higher or longer term punishment, the community is flooded with toxic players since they can be free without punishment - i love league of legends i use to play everyday now im down to once a week if not a little more but thats because of the constant toxic players i get either side of the team, reporting them doesn't do anything, i get the same people still being toxic the next day lol, im just going to be playing less and less until i stop playing completely due these type of unfriendly players.

replies.body:
The bans are rolling out, and they are substantial.

I should know. I copped a 14 day one for being a jerk :/
Or you could press the mute button and not be disabled
